title: Whole roasted masala chicken and potatoes
description: This whole chicken is marinated in spices before being roasted to a juicy, succulent dish served with spicy potatoes.Each serving provides 569kcal, 73g protein, 47g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars),	9 fat (of which 2g saturates), 5g fibre and 1.3g salt.
ingredients: 2 tbsp peeled, finely chopped root ginger
2 tbsp finely chopped or crushed garlic
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
5 medium potatoes, peeled, halved lengthways, and cut into 5x4cm/2x1½in chunks
¾ tsp freshly ground black pepper
